name: iPhone X
description: iPhone X is a line of smartphones designed and marketed by Apple Inc. It was unveiled at Apple's WWDC event on May 17, 2017, and was released worldwide on September 22, 2017. The iPhone X was Apple's tenth iPhone, succeeding the iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus, and was the first device to support the iPhone Xs new OLED screen. The iPhone Xs screen is 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display with a resolution of 1125 x 2436 pixels at 458 ppi.
